questionTitle: Before I <u><font color='red'>moved</font></u> to another place, the man who <u><font color='red'>lives</font></u> across the street <u><font color='red'>often helped</font></u> me <u><font color='red'>with</font></u> my English.
<u><font color='red'>Upon</font></u> <u><font color='red'>hatching</font></u>, young ducks <u><font color='red'>known</font></u> <u><font color='red'>how to swim</font></u>.
<u><font color='red'>In order of</font></u> go abroad, one <u><font color='red'>must present</font></u> <u><font color='red'>a</font></u> <u><font color='red'>medical</font></u> report.
How ________ you manage to get here so quickly?
The guide walked so ________ that most of the party could not keep up with him.
Membership of the club, ________ costs $10.000 a year, is only open to people over the age of 60.
The young man swore that he would take ________ his father's killers.
________ he wasn't feeling very well, Mr Graham went to visit his aunt as usual.
That fellow has a dishonest ________ in his character.
Having looked the place ________, the gang went away to make their plane.
We're selling the hotel ________ of the summer, and retiring.
I think he is unwell; he was complaining ________ a headache this morning.
You'll have to hurry because the ________ train leaves in ten minutes.
I am not used ________ spoken to in such a rude manner.
There was a beautiful, small hotel standing ________ hundreds of palm trees near the beach.
As the two teams were ________ at the end of the game, they had to play again to decide the winners of the competition.
The shops are always ________ of people at Christmas time.
His request ________ me completely by surprise.
I have often ________ why they went to live abroad .
I know he is slow at understanding, but you have to be patient ________ him.
Most people never ________ with violent crime.
I don't think I ________ this book ever before.
a City man = ________.
anwers: a man who works in the City, the financial heart of London
a man who is born in the City, the financial heart of
any man with a higher education
someone who is constantly showing off
